entry.title: Geometry Women's Spats
entry.summary:
Vendor: XMARTIAL
Type: Women - Spats
Price: 29.95

Geometry Women's Spats is designed to give comfort and protection while you show off your inner punk girl in you. With its light material that feels like wearing your second skin, these spats are perfect for any occasion. Great as MMA and BJJ spats, for surfing, watersports, as workout compression pants for women, or as leggings for lazy days.

  • Made with premium soft fabric
  • Four-way stretch, which means fabric stretches and recovers on the cross and lengthwise grains
  • A high-waist design that provides perfect shapewear for the body
  • Breathable and anti-wrinkle fabric designed for maximum comfort and unimpeded range of motion

entry.title: Roaring Wolf MMA Bundle
entry.summary:
Vendor: XMARTIAL
Type: MMA Bundle
Price: 55.00

Fire Tiger MMA Bundle is designed to keep up with even the strongest warrior, the Muay Thai shirt and shorts featured in this bundle are perfect for high intensity training. These items are great for jiu-jitsu, MMA and as workout gear for men.

  • 100% polyester: for increased durability against tears
  • Hook and loop closure for a secure fit along with interlocking draw string for secure and customizable fit.
  • Sweat wicking for comfortable wear
  • Anatomic Cuts at each side of the shorts boosts your range of motion while you immerse yourself in MMA, kickboxing, boxing, Muay Thai, BJJ and other sports.

The Surgeon Rash Guard surely turns heads everywhere you go. This compression shirt is the gold standard in terms of flexibility, comfort, and thermoregulation, and it is built for optimum performance. Short sleeve options are available. It's not only about jiu-jitsu anymore! Excellent for MMA and BJJ rash guards, surfing, watersports, and men's training.

  • Made with high-quality broadcloth polyester material
  • Helps optimize body temperature to maintain maximum muscle function
  • Breathable compression to support circulation
  • Ideal for Bodybuilding, BJJ, MMA, Running, Cycling, or CrossFit

entry.title: Samurai BJJ/MMA Shorts
entry.summary:
Vendor: XMARTIAL
Type: Men - BJJ & MMA Shorts
Price: 45.00

The Samurai BJJ/MMA Shorts feature an intimidating warrior sure to bring the intensity to the gym. These MMA shorts are designed with high quality, tear-resistant fabric meaning you can roll with peace of mind. Bring the beast to your gym in BJJ shorts that fit your style.

FEATURES AND BENEFITS:

  • Inside drawstring & velcro waistband enclosure for a secure fit
  • Elastic bottom and side splits for a full range of motion
  • Antimicrobial treatment to help reduce bacterial and fungal growth
  • Features an inside pocket where you can storage mobile phone, cards, keys, and small things 
  • Optimized for the highest level of athletic performance in BJJ, MMA, catch wrestling, no-gi, and submission grappling.
